required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Compare the Effect of Ropinirole Prolonged Release Once-daily Versus Twice-daily
clinical_study.official_title: An Open-label, Multi-center, Crossover Study to Compare the Effect of Once-daily Ropinirole PR and Twice-daily Ropinirole PR in Patients With Parkinson Disease

brief_summary.textblock:
1. In order to compare the benefit, side effects, and patient preference of Ropinirole prolonged release when used in once-daily or twice-daily dosing
2. In order to estimate the conversion rate of dopamine agonists into Ropinirole prolonged release

detailed_description.textblock:
1. Study subjects : Parkinson disease who are on Ropinirole immediate release or Pramipexole immediate release and are considering to change into Ropinirole prolonged release
2. Cross over study design:
- Group 1: once daily dose for 2 month then into twice daily in divided dose for 2 months
- Group 2: twice daily in divided dose for 2 months then into once daily dose for 2 months
3. Dose adjustment may be done in the first 4 weeks.
4. Compare the benefit,side effects, and patient preference between the once daily vs twice daily dosing.

primary_outcome.time_frame: After 16 weeks or at last visit for early completion
primary_outcome.description: Patient preference between once-daily and twice-daily regimen

secondary_outcome.measure: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale, Part 3
secondary_outcome.time_frame: 8 weeks for each arm or at last visit
secondary_outcome.description: Unified Parkinson's disease rating scale (UPDRS) motor scale after 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion. UPDRS part 3 is motor scale for parkinson's disease. Range: 0~108 Higher values represent more severe motor symptoms of parkinsonism.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 8 weeks for each arm or at last visit
secondary_outcome.description: Hoehn and Yahr(HY) stage for parkinsonism after 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion Range: 0~5 Higher values represent more severe parkinsonism

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 8 weeks for each arm or at last visit
secondary_outcome.description: Sleep questionnaire 1 for "Overall quality of sleep" Visual analogue scale: 0~10 Higher values represent worse overall sleep quality.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 8 weeks for each arm or at last visit
secondary_outcome.description: Sleep questionnaire 2 for "Nocturnal off-symptoms" Visual analogue scale: 0~10 Higher values represent worse nocturnal off-symptoms.

secondary_outcome.description: Sleep questionnaire 3 for "early morning off symptoms" Visual analogue scale: 0~10 Higher values represent worse early morning off symptoms.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion
secondary_outcome.description: Epworth sleep scale after 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion. Range: 0~24 Higher values represent worse daytime-sleepiness.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: 8 weeks for each arm or at last visit
secondary_outcome.description: Compliances after 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion. Compliance was calcuated by the percentage of used medication.

secondary_outcome.time_frame: After 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion

secondary_outcome.time_frame: After 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion

arm_group.arm_group_label: Ropinirole PR QD first, then BID
arm_group.description: Give Roipinirole prolonged release (PR) once-daily (QD) dose first, then twice-daily (BID) dosing

arm_group.arm_group_label: Ropinirole PR BID first, and then QD
arm_group.description: Give Ropinirole prolonged release (PR) twice-daily (BID) dosing, and then once-daily (QD) dosing

intervention.description: Change Ropinirole immediate release or Pramipexole immediate release to Ropinirole prolonged release (PR) once-daily or twice-daily
intervention.arm_group_label: Ropinirole PR QD first, then BID
Ropinirole PR BID first, and then QD

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Age: 30-80
2. Parkinson disease
3. On dopamine agonists (Ropinirole IR or Pramipexole IR) and are considering to change into Ropinirole PR
4. On stable antiparkinsonian medication for at least 4 weeks
5. Who signed consent to the study
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Who are on less than 2 mg of Ropinirole IR or 0.375 mg of Pramipexole IR
2. Who have dementia, psychosis, major depression and other serious neurological or medical problems
3. Who are allergic to the similar medications
4. Who has history of heavy metal poisoning
5. Who were on othe clinical trials of other medications within the last 4 weeks
6. Whoa re pregnant or lactating
7. Who are considered not eligible by the investigator

reference.citation: Lyons KE, Pahwa R. An open-label conversion study of pramipexole to ropinirole prolonged release in Parkinson's disease. Mov Disord. 2009 Oct 30;24(14):2121-7. doi: 10.1002/mds.22750.

Stocchi F, Hersh BP, Scott BL, Nausieda PA, Giorgi L; Ease-PD Monotherapy Study Investigators. Ropinirole 24-hour prolonged release and ropinirole immediate release in early Parkinson's disease: a randomized, double-blind, non-inferiority crossover study. Curr Med Res Opin. 2008 Oct;24(10):2883-95. doi: 10.1185/03007990802387130 . Epub 2008 Sep 2.

participant_flow.recruitment_details: The first subject was enrolled in September 2009 and the last subject completed the study in December 2010.
participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: A total of 82 patients with PD were enrolled in this study at two centers in Seoul, Korea.

group.title: Ropinirole PR-Once Daily First, Then Twice Daily
group.description: Ropinirole prolonged release(PR) once daily in first intervention period and twice daily in second intervention period (without washout period)

group.title: Ropinirole PR-Twice Daily First, Then Once Daily
group.description: Ropinirole prolonged release(PR) twice daily in first intervention period and once daily in second intervention period (without washout period)

group.title: Entire Study Population
group.description: Includes groups randomized to receive once daily first and twice daily first.

outcome.title: Patient Preference
outcome.description: Patient preference between once-daily and twice-daily regimen
outcome.time_frame: After 16 weeks or at last visit for early completion
outcome.population: Primary outcome measure was the preference of the subjects between once-daily versus twice-daily of RPR at the completion or at early completion after crossover. 61 of participants completing period with study intervention.

group.title: Once-daily
group.description: Once-daily preferred group

group.title: Twice-daily
group.description: Twice-daily preferred group

group.title: No Preference
group.description: No preference group

measure.title: Patient Preference
measure.description: Patient preference between once-daily and twice-daily regimen
measure.population: Primary outcome measure was the preference of the subjects between once-daily versus twice-daily of RPR at the completion or at early completion after crossover. 61 of participants completing period with study intervention.

outcome.title: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale, Part 3
outcome.description: Unified Parkinson's disease rating scale (UPDRS) motor scale after 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion. UPDRS part 3 is motor scale for parkinson's disease. Range: 0~108 Higher values represent more severe motor symptoms of parkinsonism.
outcome.time_frame: 8 weeks for each arm or at last visit
outcome.population: Total number of patients are 61 (Group 1 + Group 2), because of Crossover design. Once-daily or Twice-daily arm means clinical variables measured in once-daily or twice-daily regimen, respectively.

group.title: Once-daily of Ropinirole PR
group.description: Once-daily regimen of Ropinirole Prolonged release administered in either first intervention peirod or second intervention period.

group.title: Twice-daily of Ropinirole PR
group.description: Twice-daily regimen of Ropinirole Prolonged release administered in either first intervention peirod or second intervention period.

measure.title: Unified Parkinson's Disease Rating Scale, Part 3
measure.description: Unified Parkinson's disease rating scale (UPDRS) motor scale after 8 weeks in each arm or at last visit for early completion. UPDRS part 3 is motor scale for parkinson's disease. Range: 0~108 Higher values represent more severe motor symptoms of parkinsonism.
measure.population: Total number of patients are 61 (Group 1 + Group 2), because of Crossover design. Once-daily or Twice-daily arm means clinical variables measured in once-daily or twice-daily regimen, respectively.

analysis.groups_desc: The UPDRS-part3 was compared between the Once-daily of Ropinirole PR arm and the Twice-daily of Ropinirole PR using the Wilcoxon signed rank test.

event.sub_title: Aggravation of vivid dream or REM sleep behavior disorder

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.

clinical_results.limitations_and_caveats: This study was designed to open-label study. We cannot exclude the psychological effect of each regimen.
